name: Hamle
description:
WARNING! The game contains violence, gore and pixel blood.

Hamle the cyclops is in trouble!

  • Help our hero return home from a weird dimension.
  • Avoid nasty creatures (or get rid of them).
  • Explore 15+ mini locations to solve the puzzle.
  • Pick up and use over 16 different objects.
  • Talk to several NPC's to get a clue.
  • Experience 3 difficulty levels to get different results.
  • Choose between 2 languages: English and Russian.
  • Control your character by using keyboard or joypad.

Try to find various endings!
